inclusion.criterion: Histologically confirmed adenocarcinoma of the colon
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Gross inferior (caudad) margin of the primary tumor must be ≥ 12 cm from the anal verge by rigid proctoscopy
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Stage III tumor must have been completely resected within the past 56 days
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Must have documented en bloc resection in patients with tumor adherence to adjacent structures
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Tumor-related obstructions and colonic perforation are allowed
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: At least 1 pathologically confirmed positive lymph node
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: No evidence of residual involved lymph node disease
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Tumor-related obstructions and colonic perforation are not allowed
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has a history of 2 prior C diff infections, the most recent just 1 month ago. Recent antibx use in the last month on prior admission.
